item.title: End IA-31 South at IA-141 and CH-L12
item.description: End IA-31 South at IA-141 and CH-L12 in Smithland. Use IA-141 west to Sloan; IA-141 east to Mapleton; and CH-L12 South to Rodney. The signs in the background indicate routes of the Loess Hills National Scenic Byway.

item.title: End IA-31 South at IA-141
item.description: End IA-31 South at IA-141 in Smithland.

item.title: IA-31 South Approaching IA-141 - Smithland
item.description: IA-31 South approaching IA-141 in Smithland.

item.title: US-20 East/IA-31 South at US-20/IA-31 Split and CH-L36
item.description: US-20 East/IA-31 South at US-20/IA-31 split and CH-L36 in Correctionville.

item.title: IA-31 South at US-20
item.description: IA-31 South at US-20 in Correctionville. IA-31 South joins US-20 westbound briefly.

item.title: IA-31 South at US-20 - Correctionville
item.description: IA-31 South at US-20 in Correctionville. Use US-20 West to Holstein; US-20 East to Anthon and Molville. IA-31 South joins US-20 briefly eastbound.

item.title: IA-31 South - Correctionville
item.description: Entering Correctionville on IA-31 South. Speed Limit 45 MPH.

item.title: IA-31 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on IA-31 south. Distance to Washta and Correctionville.

item.title: IA-31 South - Quimby
item.description: Entering Quimby on IA-31 south. Speed Limit 45 MPH.

item.title: US-59 South Approaching IA-31/CH-C63
item.description: US-59 South approaching IA-31/CH-C63 in Cherokee County.
